name: 2024 the 4th International Symposium on AI
content: Publication: Submitted paper will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers will be included in conference proceedings, indexed by EI Compendex & Scopus. Springer Journal | Human-Centric Intelligent Systems Selected paper will be recommended and invited to publish an extended version on the following journals. Please make sure you have added at least 30% of a new contents.
